page.title: 11R.A.F. INNSWORTH (1)
page.content: THE NON-OPERATIONAL COMPUTERISED HEADQUARTERS OF R.A.F. RECORDS IS BASED AT R.A.F. INNSWORTH. HERE THERE IS A PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT SECTION WHICH ARRANGES POSTINGS TO MANY PARTS OF THE WORLD, E.G. GERMANY, HONG KONG, BELIZE, CYPRUS, THE FALKLAND ISLANDS AND GIBRALTAR. PAY FOR SERVICEMEN IS CALCULATED HERE. A SUPPLIES SECTION DEALS WITH THE REQUISITIONING OF MOST REQUIRE- MENTS, E.G. CLOTHING, FURNITURE, STATIONARY, VEHICLES, ETC. CARS, BUSES, LORRIES AND BIKES ARE REPAIRED AT THE SERVICE SECTION. THERE IS A GUARD ROOM FOR SERVICEMEN WHO HAVE DISOBEYED SERVICE RULES, E.G. GOING ABSENT WITHOUT LEAVE. THIS COMPRISES SEPARATE CELLS AND HOUSES UP TO 8 DETAINEES WHO MAY REMAIN HERE FOR UP TO 28 DAYS.
